title.narrative: Fortaleciendo la influencia en la gobernanza sobre seguridad alimentaria de las principales redes de pequeos/as productores/as de América Latina

description.narrative: El Proyecto tiene como objetivo especfico de crear capacidades en las principaes redes regionales campesinas (CLOC/Va campesina, COPROFAM, Foro Centroamérica vulnerable y Red de Organizaciones de Mujeres Rurales en Centroamérica que aglutinan a más de 400 organizaciones) para influir en la formulación de polticas regionales y nacionales sobre tierras e inversión en adaptación de la agricultura al Cambio Climático

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: Relevant organisations are able to appropriately defend their positions

comment.narrative: Relevant organisations are able to appropriately defend their positions

actual.value: Many oganisations have shown increased ability .
